SongName: San Francisco (Be Sure To Wear Flowers In Your Hair)
Lyric:
[00:07.000]If you're going to San Francisco
[00:15.000]Be sure to wear some flowers in your hair
[00:24.000]If you're going to San Francisco
[00:32.000]You're gonna meet some gentle people there
[00:42.000]For those who come to San Francisco
[00:51.000]Summertime will be a love-in there
[01:00.000]In the streets of San Francisco
[01:08.000]Gentle people with flowers in their hair
[01:18.000]All across the nation such a strange vibration
[01:26.000]People in motion
[01:33.000]There's a whole generation with a new explanation
[01:42.000]People in motion people in motion
[01:50.000]For those who come to San Francisco
[01:58.000]Be sure to wear some flowers in your hair
[02:07.000]If you come to San Francisco
[02:15.000]Summertime will be a love-in there
[02:28.000]If you come to San Francisco
[02:36.000]Summertime will be a love-in there
